II. Purpose of Addendum
Wolverine Human Services Aftercare has moved to a new location.
III. Methodology
04/20/2005- Received a Child Placing Agency Application to change the address of
the Agency. The Chief Administrator states the official move date is 05/09/2005.
05/03/2005- An onsite inspection of the new Agency location was conducted.
05/05/2005- A message was received from the Chief Administrator confirming that
the Agency is moving to the new location and will be operating from that location
effective 05/09/2005.
05/06/2005- A change of address was completed. The Office of Children and Adult
Licensing no longer requires a new license number and a provisional license when a
Child Placing Agency moves to a new location.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
Wolverine Human Services Aftercare is moving to a new location effective
05/09/2005. The new location is 24365 Van Born, Taylor, MI 48180, telephone
number 313-295-6264. The Agency plans future branch offices to accommodate
clients. They were advised of the policy for operating out of more than one office.
An onsite inspection was conducted by the Licensing Consultant on 05/03/2005. The
Agency will be housed in a single story building. The building is located on a main
street and is close to public transportation. The new location has a reception area,
conference room/visitation room, and both individual office space and a large area
where cubicles will be installed. The office equipment will be transferred to the new
location.
The Agency’s program remains the same. The Agency continues to provide Foster
Care and Independent Living Services. An Interim Licensing Inspection was
conducted on 11/01/2004. The Agency is on a Regular License, effective
11/30/2003-11/29/2005.
V. Recommendation
It is recommended that Wolverine Human Services Aftercare continue on a Regular
license.
